definition: used to imply that one would expect the fact to be the opposite of that stated
details:
adverb
- used to imply that one would expect the fact to be the opposite of that stated
= synonyms: in reality
- in actual fact
= example: in actual fact
= synonyms: really
- as a sentence modifier to add slight emphasis
= example: as a sentence modifier to add slight emphasis
- at the present moment
= example: at the present moment
= synonyms: now
